title: Two adults and three children found murdered at condo
text:
Two adults and three children were found dead inside an condo in Abington, Massachusetts (Picture: WHDH)

Two adults and three children have been found murdered in an apartment building, police said.

Authorities in Abington, Massachusetts say they found a 40-year-old woman, a 43-year-old man, a twin nine-year-old boy and girl, and an 11-year-old girl were killed from apparent gunshot wounds.

Plymouth County District Attorney Tim Cruz said ‘This is just a horrible, horrible event’ in a press conference about the murders. Authorities say said they believe the killings were an isolated incident, according to Boston 25.

They have yet to comment further on whether the killings were part of a murder-suicide, or if they had been committed by someone who fled the scene afterwards.

‘When something unimaginable like this happens there’s always gonna be more questions than there are going to be answers.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

The gruesome discovery was made by a relative that showed up at the home to bring the children to school Monday morning.

Authorities have not yet released the names of the family involved. The investigation is still ongoing.

Police have since said that there is no threat to the public and they are not looking for any suspects, indicating that they believe it was a murder-suicide.

This is a developing story. Updates to follow.
description: A 40-year-old woman, a 43-year-old man, twin nine-year-olds, and an 11-year-old were found dead from gunshot wounds.
